docs.snippet: Strauss: Ein Heldenleben. Cleveland Orchestra conducted by Artur Rodzinski. (Columbia, five twelve-inch records, $5.50). Mr. Rodzinski has the temperament for and an appreciation of the brash quality required for this score. He and his orchestra do...
docs.lead_paragraph: Strauss: Ein Heldenleben. Cleveland Orchestra conducted by Artur Rodzinski. (Columbia, five twelve-inch records, $5.50). Mr. Rodzinski has the temperament for and an appreciation of the brash quality required for this score. He and his orchestra do their best to make it persuasive.

docs.snippet: THE early planners are already charting Summer vacation possibilities. And for those who want a complete change of scene, Alaska again looms large on the travel horizon. Several tours to Alaska are scheduled to start from Seattle in June, tours of...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE early planners are already charting Summer vacation possibilities. And for those who want a complete change of scene, Alaska again looms large on the travel horizon. Several tours to Alaska are scheduled to start from Seattle in June, tours of varying lengths under the direction of informed leaders.

headline.main: RANDOM NOTES FOR TRAVELERS; Tours to Alaska in June -- New Harbor Work in Colombia -- Cruises Down South American Coasts -- Flying to Canada

docs.snippet: Continued strength in the Cuban peso was the only distinguishing mark in the foreign exchange trading last week. At the top price, of 96.75 cents the Havana currency had picked up 3 1/2 cents since the first of the month, about the time the upward...
docs.lead_paragraph: Continued strength in the Cuban peso was the only distinguishing mark in the foreign exchange trading last week. At the top price, of 96.75 cents the Havana currency had picked up 3 1/2 cents since the first of the month, about the time the upward movement started, and which has revolved around the seasonal sugar movement, an enlarged tourist traffic and expectations of a new loan from the Export-Import Bank. The close was 96.25 cents.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 30 -- Nelson A. Rockefeller, Coordinator of Commercial and Cultural Relations between the American republics, today announced the members of the Chilean National Council, the fifth of twenty-one councils being established by the...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 30 -- Nelson A. Rockefeller, Coordinator of Commercial and Cultural Relations between the American republics, today announced the members of the Chilean National Council, the fifth of twenty-one councils being established by the Inter-American Development Commission in its program for the stimulation of trade among the American republics.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 31 -- Moore-McCormack Lines, Inc., an American steamship company engaged in South American trade, filed today a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for 30,000 shares of $5 cumulative convertible preferred stock, $100 par, and 235,000 shares of common stock, $1 par.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, April 5 -- Following the example of the United States and the greater part of the Latin-American States, Uruguay today took possession of all ships in her ports belonging to the totalitarian powers or to countries controlled...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, April 5 -- Following the example of the United States and the greater part of the Latin-American States, Uruguay today took possession of all ships in her ports belonging to the totalitarian powers or to countries controlled by them.
